body:
# Bug Report

## Description

If you delete the quoted message of a reply, at first, it keeps the user info, but still loses the color, which is not right.

Afterwards, if you reload, it then loses all user info.

![image](https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/assets/11926403/0a32cadb-c79a-460b-94c7-69a5cf3354e5)

In the image above, you can see both. The reloaded state is the message above. The "just deleted" state is the second one.
Ignore the Resend message.

## Steps to reproduce

1. Send a message in a chat
2. Reply to that message
3. See that the user color changed
4. Reload the app
5. See that the quoted user info disapeared

#### Expected behavior

The user info that was previously availbe in a quoted message should still be available after the original message was deleted.

#### Actual behavior

Missing user color, then missing info completely

### Additional Information

- Status desktop version: master `03d4fbcc48f1db4c49fc2c9a99ff6de242d620eb`
- Operating System: Ubuntu 20
